constraints.name: modification_limit
constraints.description: 字符串最多可以修改一个字符
constraints.formal: T = S with at most one character modified

constraints.name: partial_order_constraint
constraints.description: 子串是非偏序的，当且仅当可以通过修改字符串的一个字符，使得所有原先小于该子串的子串都不再小于它

constraints.name: character_modification_range
constraints.description: 修改后的字符可以是任意值，包括比 'a' 小或比 'z' 大的字符
constraints.formal: T[i] can be any character, including those outside the range 'a' to 'z'
